Author: piippon
Content: I have a general tip about the combat btw if anyone wants_ realizing this made it really click with me finally: ||never stop getting in people's faces_ you have unlimited stamina for a reason_ keep relentlessly attacking all the time||

Author: piippon
Content: ||you can usually wail on them until they parry you_ at which point you can usually parry their counter and then keep comboing after that||
